Blog.post: OMG!!!!!! how cood the teacherz 4m aim high that werent here last year noe about j-crew?!?!?!?!??! i member jackie had a *huh?* look on her face...and i wooda 2...thats so weird!!!!! n then the teacher sed *u guys r famous!!!!!* wuh?!?!?!!? i reli dunt get that!!!! i mean, it sounds lyke the teachers *talked* with each other. ..weird.. im still freaked out about that!!!!!!!!!!! scared meeh wen she sed that... hhmmm....nothin reli 2 do. i h8 weekends now!!!!!! weekdays r kewler!!!!!!! lolz. only 53 more dayz of summer boredness 4 meeh!!!!!!! im glad skewl startz early 4 officers!!!!!!!!!! yay!!!!!!!!!!!! =D OUI...but ill still be bored in the weeks afta aim high...and the dayz b4 skoo. >.
